Version 4.0b2

Version 4.0b1

  • Stacking angle changed so units can be moved from an open stack to hex immediately above.
  • Add 'Fired' submenu to all combat units with options to create Prep, Def or Adv Fire counters.
  • Removed Moved characteristic from Entrenchment counters.
  • Implement Game Piece Layers. Added two layers - Terrain and Ground. All units added to Ground layer except Smoke, Fire, Building Fire, Rubble, Ford, Wire, Roadblock. Terrain unit stack in their own stack separate to any Ground units in the hex.
  • Changed Smoke, Building Fire and Rubble counters to full size hex shaped counters.
  • Overview window is scrollable.
  • SL 104art malfunction side now rotates.
  • Default map zoom level set to 4.
  • Removed Turn record from Info window. Added Turn Tracker to Launch bar.
  • HIP counters report status when changing too and from HIP.
  • American leaders get DM counter when flipped.
  • Added 'Cleared' layer to mine counters.
  • Moved Rubble, Fire and Building Fire to top of Locations/Terrain menu.
  • Text labels on blank counters moved from top to center of counter.
  • LOS shows range in non-verbose mode.
  • Added Last Move Highlighter.
  • Added Public notes and Delayed Notes.
